title: Are You Fumbling A Baddie?
subtitle: She’s a 10. You’re... under review.
tagline: Every question is a scene. Every answer is a confession.

questions.text: She posts a thirst trap and it goes viral. Your first thought?

options.text: That’s my girl. Everyone can look, I get to touch.
She’s so fine it’s actually insane
Why does she need that kind of attention?
I wouldn’t say anything but it would bother me

questions.text: She tells you she’s going out with her girls tonight. No details. What’s running through your head?

options.text: Have fun, be safe, call me when you’re home if you want
Cool, I’ve got my own plans anyway
Where? Who’s going? What time will you be back?
I don’t say anything but I check her location

questions.text: When she’s going OFF about something — loud, passionate, maybe a little unhinged — your move is:

options.text: Let her ride it out. I’m here when the storm passes.
Match her energy. We’re both yelling now. It’s kind of fun.
Try to logic her out of it because she’s being ‘irrational’
Tell her she’s overreacting and walk away

questions.text: Be honest — do you actually see a future with her?

options.text: Yeah. Her, exactly as she is. That’s the girl I want.
I think so but I’m scared to say it out loud
I would if she calmed down a little
I’m just seeing where it goes (it’s been 6 months)

questions.text: What do you actually like about her? Pick the one that’s most true.

options.text: She’s the most interesting person I’ve ever met
She makes me want to be better without even trying
She’s hot and the sex is crazy
I honestly don’t know anymore

questions.text: She wants to talk about ‘us.’ Your honest reaction?

options.text: Good. I have things I want to say too.
Nervous, but I’m showing up for it
Immediately assume it’s a trap
Pretend I didn’t see the text until tomorrow

questions.text: On a scale of 0–10, how much does her intensity scare you?

verdicts.title: She Might Actually Keep You
verdicts.description: Against all odds, you might not be delusional. You see her — actually see her — and you’re not running. That’s rare. Don’t let this go to your head though. She chose you, which means she can un-choose you. Stay sharp. Woo that woman like you’re still trying to get her number.

verdicts.title: The Fumble Is Loading…
verdicts.description: You’re giving just enough to stay in the game but not enough to win. She’s noticed the gaps. She’s not saying anything yet because she’s hoping you’ll figure it out — but she’s also mentally drafting the roster of people in her DMs who WOULD figure it out. You have maybe one more season of this behavior before she’s gone. The bar is underground and you’re still tripping over it.

verdicts.title: Fumble in Progress — All Units Respond
verdicts.description: Sir, the bag is in the air and you’re watching it fall in slow motion while checking your fantasy football lineup. She’s not asking for the moon. She’s asking you to show up, speak up, and act like you actually want to be here. You are currently failing at all three. This is your ‘before’ era. The question is whether you have an ‘after.’

verdicts.title: Certified Fumbler — She’s Already Gone
verdicts.description: She’s not writing the ‘I’ve been thinking…’ text anymore. She wrote it, deleted it, rewrote it, and then decided you don’t even deserve an explanation. Her friends have a group chat about you and the name of it would make you cry. She’s going to look incredible at the function this weekend and you’re going to see the pictures and realize what you had. This isn’t a wake-up call. This is the obituary.
